clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in left upper lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in left upper lobe.
Bronchiectatic changes in left upper lobe region.
Collapse of left upper lobe lobe with volume loss.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left upper lobe.
Focal consolidation in left upper lobe with air bronchogram.
